message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to you.  Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay $1050000. This is the maximum amount I am comfortable spending.

Bob, I understand your position.  While I value your interest, $1050000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1075000. This represents a significant compromise on my part.  Let's see if we can find common ground here.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on your product, I am willing to pay $1065000.
